description: If Harmony is any where near as good at her studies as she is at fucking, they will have to invent a higher grading standard. This shoot is part 3 of her lesson plan and the last scene FuckingMachines.com has of the Harmony Rose legacy. We can only hope she comes back for spring break.
title: Study Hard, Play Hard
